      • Paddle

        public Paddle(java.lang.Integer startingPosX,
              java.lang.Integer startingPosY,
              java.lang.Integer upKey,
              java.lang.Integer downKey,
              java.awt.Color color,
              java.lang.String name)
        the constructor for the paddle object
        Parameters:
        startingPosX - the starting x postion of the paddle
        startingPosY - the starting y postion of the paddle
        upKey - the control for making the paddle go up
        downKey - the control for making the paddle go down
        color - the color of the paddle
        name - the name of the player that controls the paddle

      • objectCollides

        public boolean objectCollides(java.lang.Integer otherX,
                              java.lang.Integer otherY,
                              java.lang.Integer otherWidth,
                              java.lang.Integer otherHeight)
        checks if the paddle has collided with another object based on the parameters
        Parameters:
        otherX - the x position of the object being checked
        otherY - the y position of the object being checked
        otherWidth - the width of the object being checked
        otherHeight - the height of the object being checked
        Returns:
        true if the paddle overlaps with the object given, otherwise return false
